Posts.Content: Moving_forward wrote: Dear Sisters, Over the last 9 months I have gone through surgeries, chemo, & radiation will be completed in the next few weeks.Â  I will be starting either Tamoxifin or one of the aromatase inhibitors and then into the ongoing follow-up phase. Some days I wake up strong and feel great, then another day I have a more sluggish time getting myself going. I understand this transition can be harder than you would expect. I know am I am not the first to experience this...Please share what helped you get through this phase. Dx 9/17/2010, ILC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 1, 20/23 nodes, ER+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tips for Transitioning from Active Treatment Moving_forward Moving_forward
